rule:
---
apiVersion: "io.jetic.jetalert/v1"
kind: "JetAlertRule"
metadata:
  name: "testalert"
  labels:
    jetic.io/jetalert.uuid: "e2f5b477-de12-4e9e-8052-c144ec6e5b74"
spec:
  rule: |-
    # Example of JetAlert Rule
    type: frequency
    name: testalert11
    index: jetic-messages
    num_events: 1
    timeframe:
       minutes: 60
    filter:
     - query:
         query_string:
           query: "*"
    sort_by: "timestamp"
    alert:
      - "debug"
name: testalert
